net.bubbaland.trivia

Class Question

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.bubbaland.trivia.Question
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Question
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A data structure for questions. The Question class contains all of the data for a particular question.
    Author:
    Walter Kolczynski
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
